content.prompt: A competitive profit-maximizing firm is currently producing at an output level at which the marginal revenue is equal to marginal cost. Which of the following changes will NOT affect the profit-maximizing quantity?

choices.label: An increase in the firmâ€™s revenues

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
